description: Creates an assignment with one specified IAM policy, identified by its Amazon Resource Name (ARN). This policy assignment is attached to the specified groups or users of Amazon QuickSight. Assignment names are unique per Amazon Web Services account. To avoid overwriting rules in other namespaces, use assignment names that are unique.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account where you want to assign an IAM policy to Amazon QuickSight users or groups.

parameters.name: AssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the assignment, also called a rule. The name must be unique within the Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: AssignmentStatus
parameters.description: The status of the assignment. Possible values are as follows: ENABLED - Anything specified in this assignment is used when creating the data source. DISABLED - This assignment isn't used when creating the data source. DRAFT - This assignment is an unfinished draft and isn't used when creating the data source.

parameters.name: Identities
parameters.description: The Amazon QuickSight users, groups, or both that you want to assign the policy to. (string) --- (list) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace that contains the assignment.

nested_items.name: AssignmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the assignment. The name must be unique within the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: AssignmentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the assignment. Possible values are as follows:
ENABLED - Anything specified in this assignment is used when creating the data source.
DISABLED - This assignment isn't used when creating the data source.
DRAFT - This assignment is an unfinished draft and isn't used when creating the data source.

nested_items.name: PolicyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the IAM policy that is applied to the Amazon QuickSight users and groups specified in this assignment.

nested_items.name: Identities
nested_items.description: The Amazon QuickSight users, groups, or both that the IAM policy is assigned to.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
